front.title: PIM Multicast Border Router (PMBR) specification for connecting PIM-SM domains to a DVMRP Backbone

abstract.t: This document specifies the behavior of PIM-SM Multicast Border Routers (PMBRs) that connect PIM-SM to DVMRP networks. We assume that the reader is familiar with the PIM-SM protocol specification.[Estrin96]
